body:
Hi All,


Just a heads up that the website (along with a few other websites including radsite at the lab - including radsite) will be down tomorrow (Sat 4-June-2011) from 12 to 14 hours starting at 6am PST / 2pm UTC.


Granted everything goes well the site will be back up after that period.


Thanks for your patience.


Daniel Fuller
Building Technologies
Berkeley Lab
___
